name: 廖熒虹
objective:
認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。修完此課程，同學能
1.　　知道學術論文的基本結構。
2.　　有一般學術論文寫作的基本技巧。
3.　　寫出學術論文論文初稿，在邏輯架構上符合學術規範要求。
schedule:
課程進度 
01 02/25 Class Introduction 
02 03/4 Introducing Endnote 
03 03/11 Writing Summaries (submit research topic)
04 03/18 Research- Introduction
05 03/25 Research- Literature Review
06 04/1 Research- Method
07 04/8 Spring Break(no class)
08 04/15 Research- Result and Discussion 
09 04/22 Midterm Week
10 04/29 Research Papers Critique-1 (1~2 students)
11 05/06 Research Papers Critique-2 (1~2 students)
12 05/13 Research Papers Critique-3 (1~2 students)
13 05/20 Research Papers Critique-4 (1~2 students)
14 05/27 Research Papers Critique-5 (1~2 students)
15 06/03 Final Presentation-1
16 06/10 Final Presentation-2
17 06/17 Attending Conference(no Class)
18 06/24 Final Exam Week (final paper due)
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 20%
2. In Class Assignments 20%
3. Final Presentation(in English) 25%
4. Final Research Paper 35%
